name: Emily's Adventure
description:
Emily is an ordinary village girl whose life changed in an instant after her being kidnapped. Having escaped from the bandits’ camp, Emily understood that she had been taken away to the other world's end, and now she has to set off for a dangerous journey to find the way back home. Help her to do it!
You are in for a fascinating travel around a faraway island. Explore the world full of plenty of astonishing places and dangerous enemies, interact with the natives and help Emily go back home!Features
  • Collateral Quests.
  • Collecting/alchemy / Сrafting.
  • Different suits for the main character
  • Radio with a big variety of music
  • Puzzles
  • Full HD resolution
